summary: Badge Management feature testing completed. Backend API tests (29/29 passed) and frontend UI testing successful.

fixed.issue: Route conflict - /users/{user_id} was catching /users/search as user_id due to registration order
fixed.fix: Moved /users/search route to api_router and registered it BEFORE /users/{user_id} route

seed_data_creation: Existing 'Top Seller' badge was already present
context_for_next_testing_agent: Badge management feature is fully functional. Admin dashboard accessible at /api/admin-ui path. Backend API on port 8002, frontend on port 3001. All badge CRUD operations tested via pytest. UI verified for badge listing, creation modal, user badges tab, and award badge modal.

backend_api.GET /api/admin/badges: Lists all badges with stats - PASSED
backend_api.POST /api/admin/badges: Creates new badge with all fields - PASSED
backend_api.GET /api/admin/badges/users: Lists user badges with pagination - PASSED
backend_api.POST /api/admin/badges/award: Awards badge to user (with error handling) - PASSED
backend_api.DELETE /api/admin/badges/users/{id}: Revokes user badge (with error handling) - PASSED
backend_api.GET /api/admin/users/search: Searches users by email/name - PASSED (after fix)

frontend_ui.sidebar_navigation: Badges link visible and clickable in sidebar - PASSED
frontend_ui.stats_cards: Total Badges, Active Badges, Total Awards, Users with Badges, Recent Awards, Most Awarded - PASSED
frontend_ui.badge_definitions_tab: Lists all badges with type filter - PASSED
frontend_ui.user_badges_tab: Shows user badges with search and pagination - PASSED
frontend_ui.create_badge_modal: All fields present: name, description, icon, color, type, points_value, display_priority, criteria, auto_award, is_active - PASSED
frontend_ui.award_badge_modal: User Email, Badge dropdown, Reason fields - PASSED
